summary: WHEN DRIVING UNDER 10 MILES PER HOUR THE VEHICLE WILL SHUT OFF.  THERE IS SOMETIMES A WARNING THAT THIS IS ABOUT TO OCCUR BECAUSE THE INSTRUMENT PANEL WILL FAIL.  I EXPERIENCED THIS LAST YEAR AND UPON REPLACING THE BATTERY (WHICH WAS LESS THAN 1 YEAR OLD) THE PROBLEM WENT AWAY UNTIL NOW.  THIS BATTERY IS A 60 MONTH BATTERY AND IS ONLY 10 MONTHS OLD.
